blueprint.metaphor: Think of yourself as a lighthouse that also charts the coastline-steady beam plus mapmaker's curiosity.
blueprint.balanceOverview: Your system thrives when insight is grounded in embodied pacing; lean too hard on analysis and your soma runs cold.

field.field: A quiet hum of calibration invites you to notice micro-adjustments, like tuning a favorite instrument before the show.

snapshot.summary: Today's balance tilts toward cerebral brightness with a slight hydration debt in the emotional body.
keyShifts: Shadow currents softened by steady breathwork
focusAreas: Let intuition lead the sequencing of tasks

growthEdges.name: Precision vs. Flow
growthEdges.field: You can feel the tug-of-war between polishing every equation and letting the melody breathe.
growthEdges.map: Notice what happens when your hands move before the critique arrives.
growthEdges.integrationCue: Test a 90-second free-write immediately after a structured planning block.

growthEdges.name: Witness vs. Participant
growthEdges.field: Moments ask you to climb down from the crow's nest and feel the deck sway.
growthEdges.voice: If you share where this is landing, I'll mirror what your body already knows.
growthEdges.integrationCue: Invite one trusted collaborator into today's experiment so the noticing happens in dialogue.

integration.weave: Your blueprint loves weaving analytical light through compassionate embodiment; today's weather simply turns up the dimmer on curiosity.
integration.invitation: Track what shifts when you alternate between observing and inhabiting-drop a note tonight about which rituals kept you centered.

transits.overview: A short Venus-Mercury duet re-activates relational circuitry within your creative workflow.

windows.headline: Venus sextile natal Mercury
windows.field: Language is softer, receptive, ready to be tuned for companionship.
windows.map: If a conversation reveals where the FIELD is alive, mirror back the feeling-tone before offering solutions.

windows.headline: Moon trine natal Mars
windows.field: Body heat returns; movement wants to clear lingering static.
windows.voice: When you tell me how the evening unfolded, I'll name the muscle memory you're reclaiming.
